body:
This PR proposes a number of improvements to RPC `getaddressinfo`:
- [x] improve/fix getaddressinfo RPCHelpman formatting
- [x] improve/fix getaddressinfo RPCHelpman content
- [x] clarify the `label` and `labels` fields in getaddressinfo RPCHelpman. See https://x0f.org/@waxwing/103011900458208513 for motivation/context. If experienced developers find it confusing, some clarification seems warranted.
- [x] update getaddressinfo RPCExamples addresses to bech32
- [x] add getaddressinfo code documentation
- [x] add getaddressinfo `labels` test coverage, and convert assertions to take advantage of the `test_address` helper function in wallet_util.py
- [x] extract a `labels_value` common helper function from the test files to wallet_util.py
- [x] vary the values of `label` and `labels` fields in the different wallet_importmulti.py tests
- [x] add a `listlabels` test assertion in wallet_labels.py

Gists of CLI output:
[`bitcoin-cli help getaddressinfo` before this PR](https://gist.github.com/jonatack/022af5221a85c069780359a22643c810)
[`bitcoin-cli help getaddressinfo` after this PR](https://gist.github.com/jonatack/4ee5f6abc62a3d99269570206a5f90ba)

Should we begin a deprecation process for the getaddressinfo `label` field? If yes, I have a follow-up ready. Cheers.
title: rpc: improve getaddressinfo test coverage, help, code docs
